message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You get a dollar, I get the rest. Seems fair, right?
This is a fair offer, Alice. You get 10% and I get 90%.  It's more than you offered me last time, and with the inflation, we'll both be better off.
Let's split it evenly this time, Bob.  It's the fairest way to go, considering the inflation. We both get a decent amount, and we don't have to keep playing this game.
